Title: Revamp your entire company
Review:
I have loved and used SoundCloud for almost 10 years but I swear every year since 2012 this app has gotten worse.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
Here‚Äôs a list of things that you CAN‚ÄôT do on the app:

Look at descriptions of songs

Message others

Listen to a song I JUST LISTENED TO again after losing service, despite the fact it should be cached

Scroll entirely through your likes

AND

Scrolling through likes quickly (the app lags and hangs while scrolling)

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-

This is downright pathetic and disgusting coming from a company who tries to come off like they support the little guy. Look up the owners/operators of SoundCloud, it‚Äôs a list of suited up, old white men who have no idea how technology works or how to stay ahead of the curve. 

I can‚Äôt wait for the day some other music takes you guys off the face of the internet. DON‚ÄôT download this app. SoundCloud has become the thing they promised not to be.

Title: This is so nice
Review: You can‚Äôt listen to every song, but you can listen to the songs posted, offline and without having to be on the app, of course there‚Äôs ads but that‚Äôs perfectly fine, just restart the app really quick. it has an autoplay so you discover new songs to jam out to or vibe to. just a solid 11/10

Title: Since high school
Review: I‚Äôve been here since I was around 14. I really enjoy this app still today, I may not like the ads in between, sometimes they‚Äôre funny so I won‚Äôt buy premium for that reason. I also enjoy hearing sounds you‚Äôd otherwise never hear from mainstream radios or artists, so that‚Äôs a huge plus for me. Thanks SoundCloud for all that.

Title: Your Music Makes it all so Real
Review: I met a guy a few years ago that was so amazing and he needed a few cars and to be bailed out of jail.  Your music helped me through the tough decisions on whether to stay with my family or to run off with a member of the mafia.  Sometimes the same song would play and it made me certain I was always doing the right thing.  even in my vulnerable state.

Title: Crashes more than a test dummy driver
Review: How many versions is it going to take SC to fix the crashing issue???? I‚Äôm a paid subscriber and all I want to do is listen to music without interruption. Several times a day in the middle of playing a song the app crashes and stops playing music. Then when I reboot the app it doesn‚Äôt remember any of my play history so if I‚Äôve been listening to a 2 hour dj mix and I‚Äôm halfway through it , I‚Äôll have to start the track all over again. Really annoyed to have to deal with this constantly. It crashes several times a day.

Title: Crashes when I skip multiple songs
Review:
I love soundcloud, without a doubt. I have had premium for over 4 years now but for some reason when I skip multiple songs that are already downloaded to my devices it completely crashes the app. Hope it gets fixed as it has been like this for a year or two.

Fix that and it‚Äôs 5 stars :)

Title: Essential app, but Ads need to be fixed.
Review: I‚Äôve always loved being able to stream music for free using SoundCloud. I don‚Äôt mind hearing an advertisement or two because I understand that‚Äôs how artists and the company make their money, but hearing the same advertisement over and over again for weeks makes it hard to like this app anymore. Nothing wrong with making free-users listen to an ad once in a while, but the same one over and over again makes it very irritating.

Title: Go vs. Pro why have both?
Review: I decided after being a long time free user to make the leap into a Pro account because I wanted to launch my music career and enjoy ad free music in the mean time. Now my access is being limited again because I won‚Äôt give you even more money?! This is beyond scummy and I‚Äôm going to tell everyone I know to avoid your platform. My recommendation do one or the other. If Go is your new paid version, cool, I will go with that. Continuing the current practice creates bad faith especially for people like me who are already extremely reluctant to pay for services like this. Sincerely, a very disgruntled app user.

Title: Need glitch improvement asap
Review: I should not have to pay for this if A simple problem cannot be fixed after contacting numerous times and no contact back. SoundCloud is a great streaming service but for the last few months it‚Äôs been closing my tab every 2-5 minutes which is irritating as songs aren‚Äôt even that long most the time and I pay for this. I‚Äôve tried deleting the app worked for a month now it‚Äôs back to constantly closing and it‚Äôs driving me crazy. I may have to entirely get rid Of my premium service.

Title: Log in issues
Review: This app is awful. I‚Äôve been trying to sign in after an update to no avail. It just gives me an error message‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs with my email and password or when trying to log in through FB. But I can login online. Glad I didn‚Äôt go pro and pay for this. And now I never will. When I looked at the help section on this issue, they gave the same canned response and then didn‚Äôt answer several people complaining about the same issue later on. Bad service for an app trying to get me to pay for an upgrade.

Title: Very great but...
Review: Your app has too many glitches! There has been too many times where your app glitches and I can‚Äôt listen to all my music anymore because of it. Lately, there is this glitch that makes me have to pay for SoundCloud go+ if I want to listen to music from official artists and that has never been the case. So, I and many others would very much appreciate you guys fixing this glitch. Thanks very much.

Title: Soundcloud Quick Review
Review: I use it primarily as a playlist for more obscure (depending on your home country culture) EDM songs.  I has most of them available for free which makes it great for me to get free music for listening to an add every few songs.  More mainstream music is copyrighted l, therefore you must have an account with them to unlock it.  Happy listening!

Title: It‚Äôs good but confusing
Review: I‚Äôve been using SoundCloud for a few years now but the most recent update has me confused. I typically like to keep my listening history clear when I use it especially at night but since the clear history button was removed I can no longer do that all I wish is for the clear listening history button to be returned with no other UI changes following. Thank you.

Title: Best place for the rarest streaming
Review: Before the streaming revolution it was a thing to find the rarest most obscure b-sides from your favorite bands. Maybe you could find a download and had to find that rare recording on a CD. SoundCloud is the place I go to find those rare albums you won‚Äôt find Anywhere else. Thank you SoundCloud for making this platform.

Title: Long time user
Review: I really love the music that‚Äôs on here. A lot of popular stuff but even more hidden talents. I love finding something/someone I‚Äôve never heard before that just fits my tastes. Sometimes the unknown songs I love become known and I end up hearing them on the radio. It‚Äôs cool to know you loved them and recognized the talent that pushed them into the spotlight. It feels like you‚Äôre a part of their success.

Title: SoundCloud Go+
Review: They recently decided that all of Juice, X, and pop smokes music AND features should require SoundCloud GO+. This left my playlists filled with previews. These artists were always free to listen to and would never require Go+ for there music. If this doesn't change its honestly not worth using the app and it would be better to use a different streaming service. I hope they fix this if not I would be moving onto other apps and for the meantime I will not be using this and I will only make periodic checks to see if they changed this.

Title: I love it, but all apps have their flaws
Review: It‚Äôs the best way that I can watch music without getting a lot of adds and the adds are short and simple. I can listen to music even when I don‚Äôt have any WiFi.  I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs SoundCloud or me but for some reason my music keeps stopping randomly. I‚Äôve tried fixing it but nothing worked. SoundCloud will probably fix it soon though because it seems like a simple glitch.

Title: What happened to the quality after the major update?
Review:
I‚Äôve used this since the app was first launched, and I‚Äôve loved it. The readings were accurate, it didn‚Äôt take long for a song to load, the interface was simple, and it was a pleasure to use. 

The major update a few weeks ago made it unusable - the most important thing is tagging music to find it, and the app can‚Äôt do it like before. It‚Äôs a shame because I really like it...I hope in a few months it‚Äôll get figured out. Until then I‚Äôll have to go to their competition.

Title: Sound cloud
Review:
It‚Äôs so much more than a music app you can be in school for playing and teacher wouldn‚Äôt even know I know from experience but it‚Äôs the fact that‚Äôs it‚Äôs not really that many adds so you can listen to
Music care free and turn of you phone and vibe to your music so think about this you can be in school or at work and don‚Äôt wanna get caught SOUNDCLOUD that‚Äôs it bye plz get SoundCloud plz

Taylor swift has two older songs that can be listened to without Go+ and mist country music requires Go+ deeply recommend for Hip Hop and other genres. Limited ads, short ads, easy to use app.

This app is a 5 Star, I hope the developers are safe in this pandemic and I wish you guys hope thank you for Sound Cloud.

My only beef with SoundCloud is that you have to log in with a computer in order to block an undesirable follower. You can't do that within the app. 
Otherwise, I'm extremely impressed.

Review:
I love this app alot! In fact its the only app i use for music. But i do have 1 suggestion.

So just like how on desktop, users can loop individual songs or playlists (on shuffle or not), and it would be very nice if mobile users could have this too!

Especially if you want to listen to a few songs on loop but cant because there isnt a loop button.

Anyways thank you and i hope to see this feature soon :)

Ps. Yes i already submitted something like this but yk it would be a good feature to have
And no, the time im submitting this (april fools) does not affect this review. A loop feature would genuinely be a good feature :)

Review: I rate this a 5 star because the app is easy to use and I can even listen to my liked songs without any WiFi or internet. It‚Äôs also free for many songs, some songs involve Go+ which cost money, but you can find covers of the same exact song for free by other accounts anyway.

Sometimes after a 15 second ad (you feel lucky because it‚Äôs finally not a 30 second ad).. a 30 second ad plays right after it!! These ads are getting out of hand and ruining your business!!

Title: Almost useless app
Review:
Bugs I encounter every single day:

‚Ä¢ If I open a soundcloud link, the app plays the audio from the last song while showing the cover art of the new song

‚Ä¢ Moves through the waveform as if a song is playing but says 0:00 time elapsed and plays no audio

‚Ä¢ Hard crashes randomly that require a full login

‚Ä¢ Audio continues playing after clearing app from recents

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúDownloaded‚Äù songs still don‚Äôt load when playing offline

‚Ä¢ Get this message at least 10 times a day: ‚ÄúDownloading paused. iOS has stopped downloading tracks. Open SoundCloud to resume the process.‚Äù

Can‚Äôt believe a better alternative hasn‚Äôt outcompeted soundcloud by now. This app was good a decade ago but literally any other music app is lightyears beyond it. This app needs to be euthanized. 

Please pay your devs more so they will actually do their jobs.

Title: A++

I see Reddit posts about this issue but no one knows how to fix it.

otherwise this is one hell of an app and i love it, the community on the other hand not so much. would like a lot less ‚Äúyo i‚Äôm a 14 year old producer from atlanta let‚Äôs F4F and peep my new track‚Äù and bots but you can‚Äôt do much about those

Title: foie gras goose app
Review:
The only reason I downloaded the mobile app is because SoundCloud makes it close to impossible to navigate through a mobile browser.

The app itself is clunky to navigate because it doesn‚Äôt have the same category menu as the desktop browser version. 

To make matters worse, it forced a song I never asked for, searched for, or care for right after one of my tracks. And there is NO WAY TO REMOVE IT. No wonder the darn thing has millions of plays. Every time I play one track of mine, it shoves that song right after.

On top of this, I paid for the upgrade to Pro, but the mobile app doesn‚Äôt recognize this. It only gives me the option to buy it again! 

So in short the whole SoundCloud experience is shove a bunch of things down your throat. They even get extortion wrong. You‚Äôre supposed to pay money to get harassed less.

Title: ~SoundCloud: Why and why not~
Review:
Hewo readers,
So I listen to SoundCloud and I think it‚Äôs awesome! But it has flaws~

IT WAS PLAYING THAT EXACT SONG!!!!!!!

Anyway~

I recommend the app, but look out for that! Thx for reading and I hope the review was helpful to you and anyone you know!

Thx,
P.S. I wanna know if that is normal so if the developers can get back to me on that, that would be awesome thx!

Rjackson117

Title: Ads trigger even when skipping songs
Review:
If you‚Äôre not a premium member, you have to listen to ads after a few songs. This itself is fine.

However. The app has no one of sensing if you‚Äôre just trying to quickly find a good sounding song. If you keep skipping songs and you only listened to 5‚Äôish seconds of each. It still triggers ads. 

This punishes the user as they are either forced to listen to songs they don‚Äôt like to reduce ads per hour, or listen to obscene amounts of ads per hour via skipping.

This inconvenience was enough for me to uninstall the app. I would have considered subscribing to a subscription. But I can‚Äôt even properly explore music without being maliciously barraged with ads. I‚Äôm good. Don‚Äôt use this service.

updated review:

Time to delete.  Audius, hearthis, mixcloud are where its at.

Old review

After 5 years of this app being stripped down almost nothing, and turning it into a breeding ground for soundcloud mumble rappers, perhaps there is hope that it will turn into a proper music player again.  A music player where one can easily view and navigate to the artist or song that they liked and saved, instead of it being just a large, meaningless wall, and endless playlists...

Title: Falsely Reporting Tracks
Review: I have had to reach out towards independent artists in the result of visualizing certain tracks that were once on my playlist and/or albums that were erroneously removed due to false reporting. In no way these certain independent artists violated any terms nor exhibited copyrighted infringement. If it wasn‚Äôt for the fact that I took the necessary precautions in writing down all tracks on my playlist and downloading these files in order to backup and safely secure the tracks on my profile, I would have been very displeased. Granted I understand updates may play a role on certain tracks to be removed but since I was able to investigate the random tracks it seems that an individual decided to falsely report certain tracks due to its lyrical content. By no means these lyrics that were being projected to the public were offensive nor in violation. I understand that if a track is being questioned that the track will be removed temporarily for further review. However this is an individual who is following my profile and is doing this as an act of spiteful retaliation. There are times where certain tracks with ‚ÄúHollywood‚Äù artists are removed and needed to be resubmitted into a playlist. I have reached out to certain independent artists in raising this awareness because certain ones were unaware of the situation, when it comes to their tracks being falsely reported. This has affected my professional process in engaging a network base with these artists, musicians, lyricist, producers, vocalists, digital sound techs (whether independent or rising). My suggestion if taken under consideration is if the developer could gray out the track if indeed the track would be under review just like it would for tracks that are not available in the U.S. until it is valid, and if not then deactivate in order for the listener to enjoy its musical content.
